result.title: McDONALD'S REPORTS THIRD QUARTER 2025 RESULTS
result.text: Global comparable sales increased 3.6%, with broad-based growth across all segments Global Systemwide sales* were over $36 billion for the quarter, an increase over prior year of 8% (6% in constant currency) Systemwide sales to loyalty members across 60 loyalty markets were approximately $34 billion for the trailing twelve-month period and over $9 billion for the quarter CHICAGO , Nov. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- McDonald's Corporation today announced results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025. "We increased global Systemwide sales by 6% and grew comp sales across all segments, a testament to our ability to deliver sustainable growth even in a challenging environment," said Chairman and CEO Chris Kempczinski.
